title: Forest clearing with rocks and peasant
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Alexander C. Speyer, Sr.
provenance_text:
Henry G. Fownes, Pittsburgh, Pa.; sold at Sotheby's, American Art Association, New York, 28/03/1935 [bought $225 Plaza Curiosity Shop, New York]; Mrs. Alexander C. Speyer, Sr., Pittsburgh; gift to Museum, February 1978.

early provenance from Miquel, no. 1318, in curatorial file

creator.full_name: Narcisse Virgile Diaz De La Peña
creator.cited_name: Diaz De La Peña, Narcisse V.
